greeting.title: GREETINGS
greeting.message: Hello and welcome to my music-website! I hope you enjoy your stay!
greeting.author: Bernardo de Oliveira

changelog.title: Version pre-6.0
changelog.message:
There will be completely new music on my website.
I already uploaded a few songs so you can get the taste.
A completely new website is coming soon. Stay tuned. Stay safe.
changelog.details:
I'll be uploading completely new songs to my website.
It's going to be only Psy-Trance.
There will be a complete renewal of my website. Soon.
changelog.author: Bernardo de Oliveira

changelog.title: Version 5.0
changelog.message: Implemented a layer7 DDoS-Protection against malicious attacks.
changelog.details: This webpage is now protected against DDoS-Attacks.
changelog.author: Bernardo de Oliveira
